originalText.text: My HVAC repair service was excellent. The technician diagnosed the problem thoroughly and explained the necessary repairs. My HVAC system is now more energy-efficient.

text.text: My HVAC repair service was excellent. The technician diagnosed the problem thoroughly and explained the necessary repairs. My HVAC system is now more energy-efficient.

originalText.text: When we moved into our house, we contacted Ace Commercial Heating and Cooling since that is who the previous homeowners used. It's been a great experience and we really like being on their maintenance plan. Very knowledgeable offering us tips to properly use and care for our system, which they have historical records of since they've serviced it.

text.text: When we moved into our house, we contacted Ace Commercial Heating and Cooling since that is who the previous homeowners used. It's been a great experience and we really like being on their maintenance plan. originalText.text: Our air conditioning unit stopped operating on the afternoon of the first day of 100 degree temperatures this year. We chose Ace Commercial Heating & Cooling and couldn't have been happier. The owner returned our call early the next morning and was actually at our home within 3 hours.  He fixed the problem, gave us some good advice on future servicing and was just a very pleasant person to be around.  We will definitely use them for any future AC or heating problems.

text.text: Our air conditioning unit stopped operating on the afternoon of the first day of 100 degree temperatures this year. We chose Ace Commercial Heating & Cooling and couldn't have been happier. The owner returned our call early the next morning and was actually at our home within 3 hours. originalText.text: My technician was punctual, professional and knowledgeable. Although I have my unit regularly serviced, it had apparently not been cleaned in a long time, if ever, and my tech showed me evidence of this in pics he had taken. Because a full cleaning was required, I know that he spent far longer than would be expected with a regular general maintenance visit.  I sincerely appreciate his unhurried approach, as well as his assurance at the end of his visit that my unit was clean and in tip-top shape.

originalText.text: Ace Commercial Heating and Cooling recently installed a furnace for me. Daniel, the technician was very professional and his attention to detail was truly impressive. Ace Commercial Heating and Cooling was quick to respond and thorough in explaining all the options from repair to replacement. My new furnace I very nice and efficient in its functionality. I am highly satisfied with the service and will work with them again.
